data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Chittaurgarh, Rajasthan, India.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Chittaurgarh, Rajasthan, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the county of Chittaurgarh, Rajasthan, India. Please, stir the 16,987 believers here to pray for awakening.
Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Chittaurgarh that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the county of Chittaurgarh a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Brahmachari people might believe through him.
Father, please give the people in the county of Chittaurgarh access to a Bible in their own language.
Spirit, teach the 16,987 believers in Chittaurgarh that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.section_summary:
the county of Chittaurgarh, Rajasthan, India has a population of 1,544,300.

We estimate Chittaurgarh has 16,987 people who might know Jesus, 18,737 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,508,575 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 16,987 believers in Chittaurgarh to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,527,312 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.
